data.title: Norma DeRose Obituary - Parlin, New Jersey
data.meta_description: Parlin Norma McCaffrey DeRose, age 96 of Parlin, passed away Tuesday March 25, 2020 at JFK Medical Center in Edison. Born in Manhattan, NY, she had lived in Parlin for 50 years. Before her retirement, Norma had worked as a seamstress for many years. She was a communicant of St. Bernadetteâ€™s RC Church in Parlin, where she was a member of the Columbiettes.   	She is predeceased by her husband Anthony, her daughter Pat Quinlan and her daughter-in-law Patricia DeRose. 	Surviving are her son Anthony, her daughter Carolyn Seber and her husband Ralph, 8 grandchildren and 9 grandchildren.  	Funeral services are private held under the direction of the Carmen F. Spezzi Funeral Home 15 Cherry Lane, Parlin, NJ 08859. Letters of condolence, directions and completed arrangements may be found by visiting www.spezzifuneralhome.com.
